description: For many, tingling cold and lashing rain are all part of the trail – with the right equipment. The ADV Skin Cross Season 15 takes the benefits of their bestseller ADV Skin vest and adds drybag-inspired main storage, water-resistant pockets, and bigger trims – for easy opening and storage in any conditions. <br><br>** The soft flasks of this running vest are not included
name: ADV Skin Cross Season 15
